mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rowno, t.* FROM TB_CIS_MAIN t where 1=1
and YLJGDM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{YLJGDM}),'%')
and XM LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{XM}),'%')
and SFZ LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{SFZ}),'%')
and PERSONID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PERSONID}),'%')
and JZLSH LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{JZLSH}),'%')
) table_alias WHERE table_alias.rowno BETWEEN #{pageStart} and #{pageEnd}
